Plot: To survive, a dying Newfoundland fishing village must convince a young doctor to take up residence by any means necessary.
Title: The Grand Seduction
Writer: Ken Scott, Michael Dowse, Ken Scott (film "La Grande Séduction")
Actors: Percy Hynes White, Sean Panting, Crystal Dawn Parsons, Brendan Gleeson
tomatoConsensus: The Grand Seduction can't quite live up to the classic dramedies it seems to consciously evoke, but ambles sweetly enough to charm viewers in its own right.
